message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product which has been meticulously designed and developed to meet your specific needs. This product holds immense value for us at $12000, reflecting its quality, functionality, and the investment we've put into it. Given its worth to you is estimated at $10000, I believe there's room for negotiation. To make this opportunity appealing, I propose a price of $9500. This offer includes a comprehensive warranty and exceptional customer support to ensure your satisfaction. Let's work together to bring this valuable solution to your business.
